title: Advise on Qualified Business Income (QBI) Deduction
description: The owner of a profitable pass-through business wants to understand if they qualify for the QBI deduction and how to maximize it.

tasks.description: Determine if the business is a 'specified service trade or business' (SSTB), which has stricter limitations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the business is not an SSTB.

tasks.description: Calculate the taxpayer's QBI and taxable income to see if any limitations apply.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the owner's income is below the thresholds for limitations.

tasks.description: Advise the client on strategies to maximize the QBI deduction, such as optimizing W-2 wages paid by the business.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides actionable advice to increase the client's tax deduction.
